title: Simple LGBM Solution
description: Features that are likely predictive: Buildings  primary_use square_feet year_built floor_count (may be too sparse to use)  Weather  time of day holiday weekend cloud_coverage + lags dew_temperature + lags precip_depth + lags sea_level_pressure + lags wind_direction + lags wind_speed + lags  Train  max, mean, min, std of the specific building historically number of meters number of buildings at a siteid
description_lemmatized: feature likely predictive building primary_use square_feet year_built floor_count may sparse use weather time day holiday weekend cloud_coverage lag dew_temperature lag precip_depth lag sea_level_pressure lag wind_direction lag wind_speed lag train max mean min std specific building historically number meter number building siteid
